CHAT.comment: TP , TM and NI are in block area playing with blocks and trucks; NI is building a highway with them; TP and TM are rolling trucks around

u.a: TP continues to play; TM rolls his truck over to TP
continues to move truck
regular voice
moves truck back; gets up and gets curved wooden blocks

TP dumps blocks down at other end of block structure; goes to shelves again; NI follows him , gets blocks; TM rolls truck around slowly; TP goes back to get more blocks; structure is now extending beyond block area into activity table area; TA approaches
TP runs over to TA; moves block , runs back to truck

NI gets another slanted block , puts it at other end of structure; TP rolls his truck around; TM watches TP; TM has put a small block in the back of his truck; TP now copies him , putting a small block in the back of his truck; TM starts moving his truck onto the block highway <minutes of silent play>
TA enters area
tries to put another block on; TA corrects placement of block; TP changes it back
TP moves his truck down highway
TA moves over to TP
starts moving truck
NI goes to shelves; TP continues to honk while moving truck around
re: TP's truck path
minutes of "silent" play except for honking by both TM and TP; TP wants to go in opposite direction of TM
TP manuevers his truck around TM's truck
TP moves back , goes in other direction
more honking
TA leaves area; NI moves curved blocks from where TP deposited them
NI moves away; TP gathers them up
TP tries to incorporate blocks into structure; gives up; moves truck down highway
looks directly at TP
starts looking at teachers
TP smiles , then turns to truck and moves it along highway again
TP's truck is right behind TM's now
rolls truck off highway ramp
TP moves block accidently; when he fixes it , he catches his finger and shrieks , loudly but quickly
both TM and TP honk , overlapping each other for a while; TP gets up , gets toys to put in back of his truck
backs to each other
TP looks towards teachers
very loud
TM and TP continue to 'beep' in perfect unison; NI , who has been building road , walks on highway to get back to shelf
TP gets up , goes to shelf; begins building road; TP and TM continue to beep in unison
gets louder
TP and TM stop beeping; TP gets up and marches on highway structure; TP stops right in front of TM's truck
TP pushes TM's truck with his foot
TP marches back the way he came , beeping
TP marches back to truck; while TM's back is turned , TP marches past truck , kicking it off highway
TM turns around; starts crying
TA enters area , picks TM up to comfort him , stands him up
still crying
TA puts arm around TP while keeping arm around TM
TP tries to get away
no answer; TP lays quietly on highway; TM moves over to truck; TA tries to pick TP up , moves him off highway; TP gets up
TP hits TA's back
blocks back in truck
starts playing with truck
TP drives truck up to TM and TA
picking at sticker on block
TP reaches over , starts picking at sticker too; TP pushes TM's hands away; TM pushes back
TA intervenes , takes TP's hand away; TP gets up
TP jabs back of TM's head with finger as he says this; TP moves to another part of structure; TM succeeds in removing sticker
takes sticker
gives sticker to TM; TM starts to go to trashcan
TM and TA leave area; TM returns
walks to edge of area

no visible response from NI , except eye contact with truck; TP leaves area; meanwhile , MA enters area , takes jacket off TM; NI plays at opposite end of structure from TP's truck; TM plays quietly; SA enters area , goes to TP's truck; picks up block from truck; TP runs back into area
SA backs off; TP checks truck
no response

approaches TP; no response; SA walks to block shelves; TP moves truck down highway; passes right by TM's truck with no incident; TP moves truck towards NI's horse; NI leads TP's truck off highway; SA walks on highway , then leaves area; TM gets up , starts walking on highway; MA enters area
leaves area
TP dumps stuff out of truck

NI comes over to look at it too; SB enters area , starts running on highway; EM enters , starts running on highway; TM and TP start honking in unison loudly , playing with own trucks now; SB and EM stop running , watch boys
stands up
girls run out of area; TP sits back down
indicates truck
NI returns to playing with his horse; SB and EM enter area again

EM and SB leave area; TP and TM play with trucks , honking; NI plays with his horse; all three congregate at one end of structure; TM rolls his truck down ramp; TP quickly goes for it; TM rushes to get it; slight struggle , TM gets truck; raises truck and a block in his hands as if to throw
looks towards

TM puts truck down on highway; MA and SB and EM go to snack room to set up; TP follows , but isn't allowed in; goes back to his truck; TM starts crying; cause unknown; truck rolls down ramp accidently; SA picks it up; TA comes over to TM
TA puts TM in her lap; SA puts truck down; TP goes over , picks truck up , and brings it back to TM
sets up truck
pats TP on stomach; TM continues to cry intermittently
points to snack room
TP leaves area; AM enters area swinging necklace
TM still crying; TA still holding TM
rubs TM's head
rubs his head again
TP enters area , goes to snack room door
TP leaves door , enters block area
AM turns away , necklace falls apart , beads everywhere; AM smiles and laughs
AM is jumping on highway; TP comes up to her
TA puts hand on TP
AM comes over to TA , gets a hug; TP grabs a toy horse; looks at NI; throw it across area; it lands near NI; TP goes to fetch it
swipes at NI's horse
fullname
TP goes back across area; then gets on sandtable; jumps off and gets onto highway; TP looks at beads and points to them
AM doesn't answer
AM doesn't acknowledge; TP comes over
neither AM nor TP acknowledge TA; TP leaves area

gives her a wadded tissue which AM has been prying out of her hand; AM starts picking up beads; TP and NI talk to MA through snack room door; MA comes and looks through door; TP points to TM; TM has stopped crying and begins to play with truck; looks up at MA; still sitting in TA's lap
TP picks up his truck and goes to MA
she stops TP from entering room; TM gathers his trucks and blocks and goes into snack room; TP puts his truck down , lays down on ground; TP starts crying loudly
TA picks up TP
TP cries a bit
points to TP's truck
TP watches; NI comes over to watch
starts playing with truck; TA gets up and leaves; NI leaves
looking at truck; TA giving beads to AM
louder
NI and TA come over
TA kneels down to fix truck

TA fixes truck , talks very quietly to NI and TP; TA gets up and leave area; soon after NI leaves area; TP stands entire time watching teachers , not playing; TP cries a little , begins playing with truck again; after a minute , TP picks up truck and leaves area END OF TAPE
